it seems, I would give them all at once for a moment of glory, of tri- umph over men, of love from men I don't know and never shall know, for the love of 
THREE these men here," he thought, as he listened to voices in Kuttizov's courtyard. The voices were those of the orderlies who were packing up; one voice, probably a coachman's, was teasing Kutiizov's old cook whom Prince Andrew knew, and who was called Tit. He was saying, "Tit, I say, Tit!" 
"Well?" returned the old man.
